tuv.seg: Nomination to the Seanad by the Taoiseach
Ainmniúcháin an Taoisigh chuig an Seanad
Eleven members of the Seanad are nominated by the Taoiseach
Ainmníonn an Taoiseach aon chomhalta déag den Seanad
The Taoiseach can nominate any person who is eligible to become a Senator
Is féidir leis an Taoiseach aon duine atá intofa mar Sheanadóir a ainmniú
When the Government is a coalition government, it is usual for the nominations to be shared between the parties in proportion to party strengths
Nuair is comhrialtas atá ann, is iondúil go roinníonn na páirtithe na hainmniúcháin de réir cumhacht na bpáirtithe
Normally, the Taoiseach makes his nominations after the other Seanad seats have been filled
Go hiondúil, déanann an Taoiseach daoine a ainmniú nuair atá na suíocháin eile sa Seanad líonta
Under the Constitution, 2 Senators may become members of the Government so it is possible for the Taoiseach to nominate a person so that they can be appointed to the Government

De réir an Bhunreachta, is féidir beirt Seanadóir a ainmniú ina mbaill den Rialtas agus mar sin is féidir leis an Taoiseach duine a ainmniú ar mhaithe leis an duine sin a cheapadh mar bhall den Rialtas
